verses.roman:
tomāra ye līlā mahā-amṛtera sindhu
mora mano-gocara nahe tāra eka bindu"

synonyms: tomāra—Your; ye—whatever; līlā—pastimes; mahā-amṛtera sindhu—a great ocean of nectar; mora—for me; manaḥ-gocara nahe—it is not possible to conceive; tāra—of it; eka bindu—one drop;
translation: "My dear Lord, Your pastimes are just like an ocean of nectar. It is not possible for me to conceive how great that ocean is or even to understand a drop of it."
